name: IsmailiNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Ismaili News skill, which has been reproduced from the TheIsmaili.org website, brings you news and events of significance to the global Ismaili community from Jamats in countries around the world.

Add Ismaili News to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account.

After adding Ismaili News, you can say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?" to hear the latest.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
